text: I am attending the 2025 NSF SaTC Aspiring PI Workshop at Washington DC!
One workshop paper about LLM-assisted CPS software vetting was accepted by LLM4Code@ICSE 2026.
One paper (Plato) improving efficiency and performance of LLM generation is accepted by COLM 2025.

We released a Systematization of Knowledge (SoK) on autonomous vehicle sensor attacks on arXiv, providing an in-depth, end-to-end analysis of how sensor attacks propagate errors through autonomous systems.
I joined the University of Arizona as an Assistant Professor.
